description: If your're searching for maximum cushioning in your go-to ski socks, look no further than our Ski Full Cushion OTC Socks. This pair of Merino wool socks helps keep things warm, but breathable. And comfortable, but always performance-ready. Elevate every ski day with your soon-to-be favorite socks.
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Over The Calf Socks - Mens
